body_html:
Hi, Vrv, thanks for your quick response, just paste the whole log as belows:
bazel build --sandbox_debug -c opt --config=cuda //tensorflow/cc:tutorials_example_trainer --verbose_failures

(cd /home/admin/.cache/bazel/_bazel_admin/b33b4c76bea799d489291f7bcf5433ae/tensorflow &&
exec env -
